div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2319 Granada (anc. Iliberris), 1895 Burial: 4th-3rd cent. B.C.? (Jenkins) Contents: AR Alexander III: tetradr., dr. Disposition: private coll. Engel, RevArch 1896, p. 211 (no details) Garcia y Bellido, Hispania Graeca I (Barcelona, 1948), p. 226, no. 12
